summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3458, for the improvement of East 70th Street from a connection to the existing trunk sewer on Ravenna Boulevard to 15th Avenue Northeast; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42826 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
